text: ...Are you really that opposed to the training camp?

...No, well
rather than the training camp...
I'd say it's the location, I guess.

Was there really a reason to come
all of the way out to the middle of nowhere like this?

Wouldn't it be fine to just do lessons
in the normal place?

I'm sure that there's some value to be gained
by changing environments like this.

Something to be gained, huh, I wonder if there really is.
... since there doesn't seem to be anything else around here.

Rather, I'd say it's precisely because
there's nothing else here...!
(I wonder if she'll be alright like this...)
